one_reviews_text:
Excellent game. Addictive, Graphix and sound nice too. Bow and pistol.  I love holding bow shot back for a sec to power it. Can jump between towers real fast too. I just did first world, 10/10 waves :)

Multiplayer modes would be so cool. Could you imagine a coop against high difficulty, or even some type of PVP too. HEHE.

VR does NOT have a definitve TD game, this could def be it.
The gameplay is awesome and the game is quite addictive. Replayability is great thanks to the endless mode. Multi-player would be great and would work so well in this game.
Almost everyone around the globe likes TD. Amazingly, this one is the first one with immersive visual! Love it!
It is a tower defense with a cute and cool design. Very fun, but adding snap turns would give it 5 stars.
